name: Corrosive Armor
description: Oxidize the green Dragon blood in your veins, limiting incoming damage to 3% of your Max Health and dealing 347 Poison Damage to nearby enemies each second for 10 seconds.   While active, this ability and your Direct Damage dealt ignores enemy Physical and Spell Resistance.
effectLines: Deals Poison Damage, and your direct attacks ignore Physical and Spell Resistance while active.
coefDescription: Oxidize the green Dragon blood in your veins, limiting incoming damage to 3% of your Max Health and dealing $1 Poison Damage to nearby enemies each second for 10 seconds.   While active, this ability and your Direct Damage dealt ignores enemy Physical and Spell Resistance.
